title: Protection Market List
description: Schema for lists of markets available on the Cozy Protocol

Version.description: The version of the list, used in change detection

major.description: The major version of the list. Must be incremented when tokens are removed from the list or token addresses are changed.

minor.description: The minor version of the list. Must be incremented when tokens are added to the list.

patch.description: The patch version of the list. Must be incremented for any changes to the list.

TagIdentifier.description: The unique identifier of a tag

ExtensionIdentifier.description: The name of a market extension property

TagDefinition.description: Definition of a tag that can be associated with a market via its identifier

description.description: A user-friendly description of the tag

examples.name: Stablecoin
examples.description: A market that takes stablecoin deposits

DivestScript.description: Parameters of the contract containing a `divest` method to exit an investment opportunity

enum: function divest(address recipient, uint256[] receiptAmounts, uint256[] rewardAmounts)

InvestScript.description: Parameters of the contract containing an `invest` method to enter an investment opportunity

InvestmentOpportunity.description: Properties required for detailing how a user can enter a protected investment after borrowing from the protection market

dataURI.description: API endpoint that can be queried to return market and user data about the investment opportunity

input.description: Array of one or more tokens a user must have to invest in this opportunity

receipt.description: Array of one or more tokens a user will receive after investing in this opportunity

rewards.description: Array of one or more tokens a user will receive as a reward for investing in this opportunity

ProtectionMarketInfo.description: Metadata for a single market in a protection market list

chainId.description: The chain ID of the Ethereum network where this token is deployed

address.description: The checksummed address of the protection market on the specified chain ID

decimals.description: The number of decimals the market's receipt token has

name.description: The name of the protection market

symbol.description: The symbol for the protection market; must be alphanumeric

logoURI.description: A URI to the protection market's logo asset; if not set, interface will attempt to find a logo based on the token address; suggest SVG or PNG of size 256x256

isTriggered.description: True if this market has been triggered, false if not triggered or not applicable

trigger.description: The checksummed address of the market's trigger contract, or the zero address for markets without a trigger

tags.description: An array of tag identifiers associated with the market; tags are defined at the list level

extensions.description: An object containing any arbitrary or vendor-specific market metadata

StrategyLeg.description: Describes one of the steps taken to enter an investment opportunity

destination.description: Platform ID the strategy leg targets

logoURI.description: A URI for the logo of the strategy leg; prefer SVG or PNG of size 256x256

chainId.description: The chain ID of the Ethereum network where this token is deployed

address.description: The checksummed address of the token on the specified chain ID

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the token balance

symbol.description: The symbol for the token; must be alphanumeric

logoURI.description: A URI to the token logo asset; if not set, interface will attempt to find a logo based on the token address; suggest SVG or PNG of size 256x256

tags.description: An array of tag identifiers associated with the token; tags are defined at the list level

extensions.description: An object containing any arbitrary or vendor-specific token metadata

name.description: The name of the protection market list

timestamp.description: The timestamp of this list version; i.e. when this immutable version of the list was created

markets.description: The list of markets included in the list

keywords.description: Keywords associated with the contents of the list; may be used in list discoverability

items.description: A keyword to describe the contents of the list

tags.description: A mapping of tag identifiers to their name and description

stablecoin.name: Stablecoin
stablecoin.description: A token with value pegged to another asset

logoURI.description: A URI for the logo of the protection market list; prefer SVG or PNG of size 256x256
